data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 3,378,884 lost people in  Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Anuppan people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, sanctify the 38,048 believers in Viluppuram and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Viluppuram, Tamil Nadu, India not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Viluppuram.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Viluppuram
location.people_groups_list: Vettiyan, Chakkiliyan (Hindu traditions), Vellalan Kongu, Paliyan, Pallan (Hindu traditions)
